QuestData.Title: Make Them Pay!
QuestData.Description: The time has come!$b$bToo long have we suffered the company of the self-righteous Alliance! Too long have we stayed our hand from cleansing our world of the weak and the desperate.$b$bNow, we bring an end to our humiliation! Now, we show them the true meaning of fear! Now, we bring honor to the Horde!$b$bHere, at Icecrown, we break the Alliance!$b$bGo, $c. Hunt them down. Break them. Take their will to live!
QuestData.LogDescription: Sky-Reaver Korm Blackscar wants you to kill 15 Alliance Players in Icecrown.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you brought suffering to the Alliance, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $c.$b$bSoon, the Alliance shall run from you in fear and the Horde shall honor your name!
